content: this colorful merino cowl and fingerless mitt set is quick and easy to knit one piece construction the mitts are knit from the fingers to the forearm no leftover yarn the skein for the mitts is split into two mini skeins before knitting finished measurements cowl 20 circumference 10 5 height fingerless mitts 6 circumference unstretched 9 5 long materials lang mille colori baby 845-0052 yarn amounts cowl 1 skein mitts 1 skein needles cowl us 16 circle #6 mitts us#4 dps stitch marker gauge cowl 6 sts/in and 8 row/in st st on #6 mitts 6 sts/in and 10 row/in in 1x1 rib on #4 unstretched
